contents.text: Welcome to 2600Hz in San Francisco, where we're revolutionizing business communications.
For sales and new account inquiries, press '1'.
To connect with an account executive, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to an account executive.

navigationGoals: Connect me with someone to set up a new business communications account.
I’d like to speak with an account executive about setting up a new cloud phone system for my veteran-run nonprofit.
Discuss enterprise SIP trunk provisioning and licensing options with an account executive
I’d like help setting up a new business phone account.
I’d like to set up a new 2600Hz account for my university research lab.

contents.text: For detailed pricing and plan options, press '2'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our pricing specialist.

navigationGoals: I need a detailed breakdown of your service plans and pricing.
I need detailed pricing and plan options to budget a small-team communications setup for my veteran business.
Get a detailed pricing breakdown for metered vs unlimited calling plans and bandwidth caps
I need someone to explain the available plans and pricing options.
Can you walk me through the pricing tiers and any available academic or student discounts?

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press '2'.
For API integration and developer support, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with a developer support engineer.

navigationGoals: Help me integrate your API into our platform.
I want help integrating your telephony API with our veteran support chatbot platform.
Receive developer support for authenticating and provisioning resources via the 2600Hz REST API
I want guidance integrating the phone service API into my system.
I need help integrating your API into a Python script for our data-acquisition system.

contents.text: For system status and general technical assistance, press '2'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Check the current system status and assist with a technical issue.
I need to check my system status and resolve recent call quality and connectivity issues.
Check real-time system status and troubleshoot SIP registration and call quality issues
I’d like to check my service status and get help fixing any issues.
Could you check the current system status and let me know if there are any ongoing service issues?
